com.github.gwtbootstrap.client.ui

Class Tooltip

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.gwtbootstrap.client.ui.base.MarkupWidget
      • com.github.gwtbootstrap.client.ui.base.HoverBase
        • com.github.gwtbootstrap.client.ui.Tooltip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasId, HasPlacement, HasShowDelay, HasTrigger, HasVisibility, IsAnimated, AcceptsOneWidget, HasOneWidget, HasText, HasWidgets, IsWidget, Iterable<Widget>

    public class Tooltip
extends HoverBase
    Link with a small tooltip with additional information.

    Technically it's an html <a> tag. The text of the popup will be the content of the anchor's title attribute.

    Since:
    2.0.4.0
    Author:
    Dominik Mayer
    See Also:
    Bootstrap documentation, Popover
